scripts.test: if-env TYPE=candence_server && (cd candence_server && nodemon cadence.js) || (cd cadence_client && react-scripts start)
scripts.start: if-env TYPE=candence_server && (cd candence_server && node cadence.js) || (cd cadence_client && react-scripts start)
scripts.client-build: cd cadence_client && npm install && npm run build
